structure.unit: STATE AND REGIONAL MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAMS

law.catch_line: Exemption of institutional officers and employees from personal attendance as witness.
law.text: No officer or employee of any institution operated by the Cabinet for Health and Family Services shall be required to give personal attendance as a witness in any civil suit out of the county in which the institution is located, but his deposition shall be taken in lieu thereof.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 308, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 253, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 79, Art. VI, sec. 107(1) and (9). -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 50, sec. 10, effective July 1, 1952.
